Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. 990640 ZSQ, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Queens, Council District no. 20 to allow to allow the enlargement of an existing community facility (school).  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Zoning Resolution Special Permit, Queens (990640ZSQ)
